events.description: Albert Einstein born on March 14 in Ulm, in the Kingdom of WÃ¼rttemberg in the German Empire.
Einstein's family moves to Munich, Germany.
Attends the Swiss Federal Institute of Technology in Zurich, Switzerland.
Graduates from the Swiss Federal Institute of Technology with a degree in physics.
Publishes his general theory of relativity, which explains gravity as a curvature of spacetime.
Completes the mathematics of general relativity.
Awarded the Nobel Prize in Physics for his explanation of the photoelectric effect.
Emigrates to the United States due to the rise of Nazi Germany and settles in Princeton, New Jersey, where he joins the Institute for Advanced Study.
Dies of heart failure on April 18 in Princeton, New Jersey, at the age of 76.
